    @allure.epic("Login Flow")
    @allure.title("Test valid login with fallback OCR and AI suggestions")
    def test_login_success(driver):
        try:
            # STEP 1: Enter phone number
            phone_input = smart_find_element(
                driver,
                name="phone_number_input",
                xpath=locators["phone_number_input"],
                fallback_text="Phone"
            )
            assert phone_input is not None, "‚ùå Phone number input not found"
            phone_input.send_keys("7660852538")

                fallback_text="Next"
            )

            assert dashboard is not None, "‚ùå Login likely failed: Dashboard not found"
    
            allure.attach("‚úÖ Login success", name="Test Result", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
